name: Call of Earth
description:
Author and developer: Yaroslav Sasim.

Управление: 

WASD, Левая кнопка мыши -взаимодействие, при подходе вплотную к объекту.

"In the game you need to find the appropriate keys to the doors, and choose the correct answer to the question to activate one of the doors portal to return to earth."

Music https://ipleer.fm/song/91560901/Bez_avtorskih_prav_-_Priyatnaya_lyogkaya_muzyka....

The game is made by one person and on their own, without the use of third-party resources (except for the soundtrack).
